instruction: Create a Django app that displays statistical data from a database.
buggy_code:
pip install django django-admin startproject Statistics cd Statistics python manage.py startapp stats vim stats/models.py from django.db import models class Statistic(models.Model): title = models.CharField(max_length=50) data = models.IntegerField() vim Statistics/settings.py INSTALLED_APPS = [ . . . 'stats', ] python manage.py makemigrations python manage.py migrate vim stats/views.py from .models import Statistic from django.shortcuts import render def stats_view(request): return stats = Statistic.objects.all() return render(request, 'stats.html', {'stats': stats}) vim Statistics/urls.py from stats.views import stats_view urlpatterns = [ . . . path('stats/', stats_view, name='stats') ] vim stats/templates/stats.html Statistics data

Statistics data

{% for statistic in stats %}

{{ statistic.title }}: {{ statistic.data }}
